parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From sun and koinoneo; to share in company with, i.e. Co-participate in.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
Darkness, either physical or moral. From the base of skia; shadiness, i.e. Obscurity.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.
